english.segment1: When it rains or it shines on this pillow of mine. I will lift up my head to the sky. So I have chance to see. Where my hope has come from. Know there's nothing that I can't abide
english.segment2: When Nothing Satisfies You. When nothing satisfies you. When nothing satisfies you. Hold my hand
english.segment3: Send forth Your Light Lord, And send forth Your Truth. Let them guide me to Your Holy Place. Then will I go to the Altar of God. To my Joy, my Delight and my Strength
english.segment4: When Nothing Satisfies You. When nothing satisfies you. When nothing satisfies you. Hold my hand
english.segment5: Why are You so downcast o my soul?. Why so disturbed within me?. Put your hope in God. My Savior, my King. My Savior, my King
english.segment6: When Nothing Satisfies You. When nothing satisfies you. When nothing satisfies you. Hold my hand
